TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ConfigurationErrorsException extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationException

summary.span: 發生組態錯誤時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a configuration error has occurred.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 擲回例外狀況發生時，組態資訊的任何錯誤時讀取或寫入。The exception is thrown when any error occurs while configuration information is being read or written. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立自訂的區段，並產生修改其屬性時的例外狀況。The following code example creates a custom section and generates a exception when it modifies its properties. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/CS/ConfigurationErrorsException.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/VB/ConfigurationErrorsException.vb#1)] 下列範例是先前範例所使用的組態摘錄。The following example is a configuration excerpt used by the previous example. ```
```

summary.span: 取得擲回此組態例外狀況原因的描述。

span.span: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.

value.span: 擲回這個 原因的描述。

span.span: A description of why this was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不包含行號，這個組態檔的名稱發生例外狀況。The property does not contain the name of the configuration file or the line number at which this exception occurred. 如果您想要包含的組態檔和行號，以及訊息名稱的訊息使用屬性。If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得屬性值。The following code example shows how to get the property value. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/CS/ConfigurationErrorsException.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException/VB/ConfigurationErrorsException.vb#6)]

.property instance class System.Collections.ICollection Errors
Public ReadOnly Property Errors As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Errors { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得錯誤的集合，這些錯誤會詳細說明擲回此 例外狀況的理由。

span.span: Gets a collection of errors that detail the reasons this exception was thrown.

value.span: 物件，其包含可識別此 例外狀況擲回原因的錯誤。

span.span: An object that contains errors that identify the reasons this exception was thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會收集許多錯誤儘可能會發生作業期間，例如讀取組態檔。The property collects as many errors as possible that might occur during an operation, such as reading a configuration file. 擲回的例外狀況會顯示只有第一個錯誤。The exception thrown shows only the first error. 您可以存取查看發出的所有錯誤。You can access to see all the errors issued.
